code: import React,{forwardRef}from"react";import{Tab,Tabs,TabList,TabPanel}from"react-tabs";import dataSchedule from"../../data/Services/schedule-gym-data.json";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ScheduleGym=/*#__PURE__*/forwardRef(function(props,ref){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"dark-bg",id:"schedule",ref:ref,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-sm-8 section-heading white-color",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"font-400 cardo-font",children:"Our Schedule"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row mt-50",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-10 offset-md-1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Tabs,{className:"schedule-wrap",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TabList,{id:"myTab",className:"nav nav-tabs",children:dataSchedule.map(function(day){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tab,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#monday","data-toggle":"tab","aria-expanded":"true",children:day.title})},day.id);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"myTabContent",className:"tab-content schedule-tab",children:dataSchedule.map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TabPanel,{className:"tab-pane show in active",id:"monday",children:item.services.map(function(service){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{"data-aos":"fade-in","data-aos-delay":100,"data-aos-duration":300,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:service.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:service.hours}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:service.trainer}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"!#",onClick:function onClick(e){return e.preventDefault();},children:"Join Now"})})]},service.id);})},item.id);})})]})})})]})});});export default ScheduleGym;
